physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: 5.8 mU/liter (N 0.4–4.2), Serum thyroglobulin: 475 ng/ml (N 240), fT4: 11.8 ng/liter (N 9–17), fT3: normal.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Grade 2 goiter observed at 12 years; thyroid ultrasound showed an enlarged, multinodular thyroid gland with a total volume of 31 ml.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid ultrasound showed a multinodular and multicystic goiter with a total volume of 33 ml when last seen at 14 years.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: 4.5 mU/liter (N 0.4–16.1); fT3: 27.1 ng/liter (N 2.3–5); fT4: 44 ng/liter (N 8.3–30.9)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Palpable goiter at birth; thyroid ultrasound showed asymmetrically enlarged thyroid gland (thyroid volume 3.88 ml).
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Total thyroid volume progressed to 23 ml at 8 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Moderate to severe bilateral sensorineural hearing impairment observed at 3 months.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hearing loss progressed, leading to cochlear implant at 2 years.
